abilities.name: shepherd of souls
abilities.description: The Cursed Horde: Yorick can summon Mist Walkers to swarm and attack nearby enemies.

abilities.name: last rites
abilities.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.

abilities.name: dark procession
abilities.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.

abilities.name: mourning mist
abilities.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.

abilities.name: eulogy of the isles
abilities.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
